mdRecord.dcterms:title: When this cruel war is over
Dearest Love, do you remember!
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Magnus, Charles.
Sawyer, Charles Carroll.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Civil War song sheet in 4 verses with chorus; without music. Printed in black on unruled paper.
First line: Dearest love, do you remember!
Charles Magnus published as an individual at 12 Frankfort St., New York, between 1860 and 1867. Works which also include Washington, D.C. imprint were published about 1863 and 1864.

Hand-colored headpiece of a woman standing on a stage, the whole enclosed in a single rule border. Magnus 215. Cf. American song sheets. Bibliographic description does not match any of the Magnus printings described in the bibliography.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Nineteenth of 25 song sheets which were mounted in an unidentified scrapbook. Rehoused, 2009.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: War songs--United States--Texts.
